subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker played bogey-free at tough Spyglass Hill on Friday for a four-under 68, giving him a share of the lead with Ted Potter Jr. in the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker played bogey-free at tough Spyglass Hill on Friday for a four-under 68, giving him a share of the lead with Ted Potter Jr. in the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am.
